description: Reproducible seed list for advanced solver test fixtures
purpose: Enable deterministic test puzzle generation for v1/v2/v3 solver mode validation

notes.v1_medium_20: Puzzles solvable by logic_v1 but not logic_v0 (two-ended propagation required)
notes.v2_hard_20: Puzzles requiring region/corridor/degree logic beyond v1
notes.v3_expert_samples: Puzzles needing bounded search (unsolved by v2 deterministic logic)
notes.reproducibility_test: Seeds for testing deterministic trace hash stability
